metadata.title: CVE-2017-15569 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In Redmine before 3.2.8, 3.3.x before 3.3.5, and 3.4.x before 3.4.3, XSSexists in app/helpers/queries_helper.rb via a multi-value field with acrafted value that is mishandled during rendering of an issue list.

criterions.comment: redmine: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
